name: Uchi ni Pochi ga Yattekita in my Pocket
overview: Uchi ni Pochi ga Yattekita - in my pocket is a digital pet simulator in which the player takes the role of an elementary school boy or girl that at the beginning have to choose between 5 different dog breeds to grow and raise it. During the game days the player have to take care of the little dog, giving him food, clean him, dress him, he can also punish or caress him, and also take him to the dog to different places of the town like the park, the school, the beach, streets, etc. The game takes place during a month time that is the time the the player's mother give him as a trial period to take care of the dog. The game also features pocketstation compatibility to see some dogs tricks there.
